name: anonymous
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: made or done by someone whose name is not known or not made public
trans_examp.trans_cn: 匿名的；不知姓名的；名字不公开的

example.eg: The money was donated by an anonymous benefactor.
example.egtrans: 这笔钱来自一位不愿透露姓名的捐赠者。

example.eg: Police said an anonymous caller warned that a bomb was about to go off.
example.egtrans: 警方说有人打来匿名电话，警告一枚炸弹即将爆炸。

example.eg: An attempt to implant an embryo using an egg from an anonymous woman donor was unsuccessful.
example.egtrans: 用一位匿名女性捐献的卵子来植入胚胎的尝试未获成功。

example.eg: He received an anonymous letter threatening to disclose details of his affair if he didn't pay the money.
example.egtrans: 他收到一封匿名信，威胁说如果他不付钱，就把他的风流韵事都抖搂出来。

example.eg: For reasons of personal safety, the informant wishes to remain anonymous.
example.egtrans: 为了自身安全，举报人不希望透露姓名。

trans_examp.trans_en: having no unusual or interesting features
trans_examp.trans_cn: 无特色的，无个性特征的

example.eg: He has a rather anonymous face.
